content: I am a Ph.D. candidate at Oregon State University, specializing in Machine Learning, Data Science and Computational Biology. I am currently working unser the supervision of Dr. Stephen Ramsey. My research focus is exploring Graphical Modeling, Causal Inference and its application in various data-driven areas.
